Subject: Action Module - file tag
Description: I have set an action to add tags to certain files but get this error when it runs: 14:16:01 - Preparing thread for action execution... 14:16:01 - Starting action execution thread 14:16:02 - ERROR - Failed to prepare input data. Invalid column name 'RowKey'. 14:16:02 - ERROR - Failed: Invalid column name 'RowKey'. 14:16:03 - Preparing the data for applets. 14:16:03 - ERROR - Log file: C:Program Files (x86)STEALTHbitsStealthAUDITActionsFileSystem20240903T141602Action.log 14:16:03 - Execution has completed 14:16:03 - Failed: Invalid column name 'RowKey'. Log file to be attached Please advise steps to diagnose the problem.
What_We_Know__c:
Added fields
Custom tags don't show up, only default ones
_______________
On this meeting we tested your configuration and ensured proper setup of the tags. We've yet to see the results, as there seems to be a discrepancy between set tags and resolved tags. We're continuing the investigation.
Solution_Comment__c: Applied proper tags, in a freshly created File Tagging job. In actions changed the tags applied.
